detail_desc: Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.

Trousers woven in an airy wool and linen weave with a regular waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and slim legs.

Straight-style shirt in airy cotton poplin with a gently tapered waist, turn-down collar and classic front. Open chest pocket, a yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and wide sides.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and wide sides.

Oxford cotton shirt in a straight, gently tapered fit with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Oxford cotton shirt in a straight, gently tapered fit with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Oxford cotton shirt in a straight, gently tapered fit with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey with stripes in glittery thread, a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and short slits at the hem.
Straight-cut top in airy jersey with stripes in glittery thread, a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and short slits at the hem.
Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton. T-shirt with a print motif and press-studs on one shoulder. Shorts with an elasticated waist and all-over print.
Loose-fitting yoga top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front and an opening and slit at the back.
Loose-fitting yoga top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front and an opening and slit at the back.

Stretch jersey vest top with deep armholes, cut-out sections at the sides and an elasticated hem.
Dress with a slub cotton jersey bodice and woven skirt. Print motif at the top, short butterfly sleeves, an elasticated seam and bow at the waist and patch front pockets.
Dress with a slub cotton jersey bodice and woven skirt. Print motif at the top, short butterfly sleeves, an elasticated seam and bow at the waist and patch front pockets.

Short yoga top in fast-drying functional fabric with long sleeves and a wrapover and open section at the back with a long tie at the hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a small stand-up collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lace yoke and sleeves.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a small stand-up collar and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lace yoke and sleeves.

Jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a lined, fitted bodice with side support and a concealed silicone trim at the top. Seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, concealed zip in one side and wide, ankle-length legs.
Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck and covered buttons at the top, a smocked seam at the waist and short kimono sleeves.
Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a V-neck and covered buttons at the top, a smocked seam at the waist and short kimono sleeves.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a lace-trimmed V-neck with lacing at the top. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a lace-trimmed V-neck with lacing at the top. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, flounce at the top, open back with ties at the back of the neck and elasticated seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
Sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, flounce at the top, open back with ties at the back of the neck and elasticated seam at the waist. Jersey lining.
Sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, flounce at the top, open back with ties at the back of the neck and elasticated seam at the waist. Jersey lining.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck front and back, sewn-in wrapover at the front and frill-trimmed neckline. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a concealed zip at the back, a seam at the waist and straight legs..

Short dress in a viscose weave with an opening and ties at the front. Hemstitching and a decorative lace panel at the top, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist with a gently flared skirt. Jersey-lined skirt.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with a wide neckline, long sleeves with rows of fringing and elasticated ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with a wide neckline, long sleeves with rows of fringing and elasticated ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Canvas T-bar shoes with a strap and hook and loop fastener at the top, canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Nylon jacket with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped side pockets and ribbing around the hood, cuffs and hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Bikini top with lightly padded cups that give the bust a natural shape and support, a deep V-neck and wide shoulder straps with laser-cut edges. Elasticated hem and a metal fastener at the back.
Thin metal chain necklace with three pendants in different designs that can be worn individually or together. Adjustable length 39-46 cm.
Canvas trainers with a hook and loop fastener, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Short skirt in woven fabric with fringes and a visible zip in one side. Lined
Long-sleeved dress in printed cotton jersey in a straight style with slits in the sides.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and laser-cut straps at the sides.

Long-sleeved blouse in airy, crinkled jersey with a collar, covered buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Narrow elastication and a flounce with decorative ties at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.

Long-sleeved blouse in airy, crinkled jersey with a collar, covered buttons down the front and a gathered yoke at the back. Narrow elastication and a flounce with decorative ties at the cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Fully lined swimsuit with padded cups, a fake wrapover with draping at the top and a racer back. Concealed elastication under the bust and four narrow shoulder straps that are braided at the back.

Fully lined balconette bikini top with moulded, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Wide, adjustable, detachable shoulder straps that can be fastened in various ways, and a wide metal fastener at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and wide sides with drawstrings.
Sleeveless dress in printed viscose jersey with frill trims around the armholes and an elasticated seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in printed viscose jersey with frill trims around the armholes and an elasticated seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Fully lined swimsuit with lightly padded cups and a V-neck with frill trims that continue over the shoulders. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross over at the back.
Fully lined bikini top with lightly padded cups, decorative straps at the front, wide shoulder straps for good support and a metal fastener at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and wide sides.
Sleeveless dress in patterned cotton jersey with pleats at the top, an elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist, and tiers to the hem.

5-pocket shorts in soft washed denim with a regular waist and slightly longer legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
5-pocket shorts in soft washed denim with a regular waist and slightly longer legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Striped jumper in a textured-knit nylon and cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Soft pile fancy dress hat in the shape of a cat’s head with padding, embroidery and sewn-on ears. Hook and loop fastener at the front. Lined. Polyester padding.
Fitted, long-sleeved dress in a fine knit with a semi-transparent section at the top and a ribbed neckline.
